//comments: contentPath, and logsDir will be prefixed with the 'data' path as/if defined in the dconfig file
ccsCloudUrl will be obtained from dinfra.landscape
do not specify logsDir if db logging is to be used
dbPath abd downloadsCache will be prefixed with the 'temp' path as/if defined in the dconfig file
contentPackagesConfig is absolute or relative to the location of app.js
seaportHostIP and seaportPort will be obtained from from sconfig file
